> The diff coverage is `n/a`.

[![Impacted file tree graph](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/25690/graphs/tree.svg?width=650&token=eZ4WkYLtcO&height=150&src=pr)](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/25690?src=pr&el=tree)

##           master   #25690      +/-   ##
==========================================

==========================================

  Lines       52965    52965              
==========================================
+ Hits        48348    48349       +1     
+ Misses       4617     4616       -1
```

| Flag | Coverage Δ | |
|---|---|---|
| #multiple | `89.86% <ø> (ø)` | :arrow_up: |
| #single | `41.73% <ø> (-0.01%)` | :arrow_down: |

| [Impacted Files](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/25690?src=pr&el=tree) | Coverage Δ | |
|---|---|---|
| [pandas/util/testing.py](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/25690/diff?src=pr&el=tree#diff-cGFuZGFzL3V0aWwvdGVzdGluZy5weQ==) | `89.08% <0%> (+0.09%)` | :arrow_up: |
